T02D1449:333a-40: rang bzhin med pa'o zhes pa'i blo gang yin pa
T02D1449:333a-41: de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
T02D1449:333a-42: 'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid du lta ba yang yin no //
T02D1449:333a-43: lta ba de rnyed nas kyang bdag med pa la dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
T02D1449:333a-44: rang gis mthong ba'i don sems can rnams la rab
T02D1449:333b-0: tu gsal bar ston pa ni @333b yang dag pa'i
T02D1449:333b-1: ngag go // mtha' gcig tu dge ba ni lus kyi las kyi mtha' yin la /
T02D1449:333b-2: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar bya
T02D1449:333b-3: ba'i phyir du pha rol skrag par byed pa yang
T02D1449:333b-4: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
T02D1449:333b-5: bsam gtan gyi kha zas tsam dang chos gos la
T02D1449:333b-6: sogs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de ni yang
T02D1449:333b-8: spyod lam thams cad du rang gi sems dang lus
T02D1449:333b-9: dang ngag dang sems kyi tha snyad dang mthun par
T02D1449:333b-10: sbyor ba ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
T02D1449:333b-12: spyod pa la zhugs rgyal sras dbang po yi //
T02D1449:333b-13: yul du sna tshogs ji lta ji ltar 'jug /
T02D1449:333b-14: de lta de ltar rig pa mthu tshig gis //
T02D1449:333b-15: sems can phan phyir mngon par 'du byed do //
T02D1449:333b-17: sgom pa'i lam du dmigs pa ma brjed pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-18: der rtse gcig pa'i sems ma g-yos pa rdo rje
T02D1449:333b-19: lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid ni yang
T02D1449:333b-21: kun du 'od kyi sa'i bar du gsal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-22: de la dang po gsum gyis ni //
T02D1449:333b-25: brtson 'grus chen mo rnams rnam par dag pa'o zhes sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-26: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khva gdong ma dang /
T02D1449:333b-27: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02D1449:333b-28: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
T02D1449:333b-29: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o zhes pa ni sgo skyong ma rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-30: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1449:333b-31: dpal he ru ka rdo rje ste ye shes kyi
T02D1449:333b-32: padma'i lte ba rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-33: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir
T02D1449:333b-34: la sogs pa ni gshin rje brtan ma la sogs
T02D1449:333b-36: dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1449:333b-37: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba ni ;
T02D1449:333b-39: de rnams dbang po lnga dang /
T02D1449:333b-40: stobs lnga'i gnas skabs kyis bsdus shing 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D1449:333b-41: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa'i stobs sam /
T02D1449:333b-43: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams ni shes rab ba ma brtson 'grus kyi stobs su'o //
T02D1449:334a-1: spong ba rnams ni brtson 'grus su'o //
T02D1449:334a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
T02D1449:334a-3: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni brtson 'grus kyi byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
T02D1449:334a-4: shes rab kyi stobs ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
T02D1449:334a-5: dran ba'i stobs ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
T02D1449:334a-6: dad pa'i stobs ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
T02D1449:334a-7: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lam gyi yan lag brgyad du bsdus pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1449:334a-8: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dag
T02D1449:334a-9: ni dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi byang chub
T02D1449:334a-10: kyi yan lag tu bsdus shing son pa'o //
T02D1449:334a-11: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar ro //
T02D1449:334a-12: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
T02D1449:334a-13: chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i lta bar
T02D1449:334a-14: ro // yang dag pa'i ngag dang /
T02D1449:334a-16: 'tsho ba ste tshul khrims dag pa'i las gsum po dang /
T02D1449:334a-17: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1449:334a-18: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T02D1449:334a-19: yang dag ba'i rtsol ba dang /
T02D1449:334a-20: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T02D1449:334a-21: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag lnga rnams las te /
T02D1449:334a-22: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D1449:334a-23: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /
T02D1449:334a-24: yang dag par bsdus na dngos po bcur 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1449:334a-25: de rnams kyang tshul khrims dang /
T02D1449:334a-27: shes rab kyi stobs te gsum po rnams su bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1449:334a-28: de la yang dag pa'i ngag dang /
T02D1449:334a-30: 'tsho ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i las yin la /
T02D1449:334a-31: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i
T02D1449:334a-32: las kyi 'bras bu ste tshul khrims kyi phung po'o
T02D1449:334a-33: // yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1449:334a-34: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T02D1449:334a-35: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D1449:334a-36: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bzhi rnams ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
T02D1449:334a-37: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T02D1449:334a-38: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02D1449:334a-41: ting nge 'dzin yang shes rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D1449:334b-0: shes rab @334b kho na chos rnams kyi rtogs pa po'o zhes pa'i rigs pa la'o //
T02D1449:334b-1: de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun po ni bcu rnams kyis dang /
T02D1449:334b-2: bcu rnams ni gsum gyis dang /
T02D1449:334b-3: gsum rnams ni gcig gis yang dag par bsdus so zhes khong du chud par byas pa yin no //
T02D1449:334b-4: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin te //
T02D1449:334b-5: 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i rang
T02D1449:334b-6: bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa'i rtsa spyi bo
T02D1449:334b-7: la sogs pa nas pus mo'i gnas kyi mthar thug
T02D1449:334b-8: pa dang lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang gi bzhi ste
T02D1449:334b-11: brgyad po'i dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin
T02D1449:334b-12: gyi lus kyi gnas rnams la yang dag par brten
T02D1449:334b-14: dbus kyi rtsa bcu rnams su yang bsdus shing son pa yin la /
T02D1449:334b-15: bcu po bcu po de rnams la la n'a la sogs pa gsum du dang /
T02D1449:334b-16: de yang dbus ma'i rtsar ro //
T02D1449:334b-17: de ltar na dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i ni /
T02D1449:334b-18: rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1449:334b-19: de las rtsa'i tshogs thams cad gsal bar 'gyur bas
T02D1449:334b-20: na de kho na la brten par 'gyur ba yin
T02D1449:334b-21: no // 'di rnams kyis ni kun rdzob dang /
T02D1449:334b-22: don dam pa'i dngos po gnyis gsal bar byas pa yin te /
T02D1449:334b-23: de nyid zung 'jug gi lam gsal bar byas pa yin no //
T02D1449:334b-25: ji ltar chu 'dzin du ma ni //
T02D1449:334b-26: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs can //
T02D1449:334b-27: nam mkha'i khongs su byung nas ni //
T02D1449:334b-28: de nyid du ni thim 'gyur ba /
T02D1449:334b-29: de ltar snang ba gsum po yi //
T02D1449:334b-30: rgyu can rang bzhin thams cad yin //
T02D1449:334b-31: yul rnams kun la zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1449:334b-34: de bzhin du gzugs kho na stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1449:334b-35: stong pa nyid kho na gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1449:334b-36: kun rdzob las ni logs shig tu //
T02D1449:334b-37: don dam pa ni su zhig smra //
T02D1449:334b-39: 'di dag gis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag so sor 'byed cing /
T02D1449:334b-40: mngon par zhen pa nyid las /
T02D1449:334b-43: grangs can gyi skyes bu la sogs par smra ba'i gzhan gyi sde pa dang /
T02D1449:334b-44: rnam pa med par khas len zhing smra ba la
T02D1449:334b-45: sogs pa'i rang gi sde pa yang sel bar byed
T02D1449:335a-0: par 'gyur ro zhes pa spros pas @335a * //
T02D1449:335a-2: dkyus ma brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:335a-4: de ltar 'di rnams nang du rtsa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1449:335a-5: phyi rol du ni zhal dang sku mdog dang /
T02D1449:335a-8: mtshon cha la sogs pa 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1449:335a-9: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T02D1449:335a-10: pull'i ra la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
T02D1449:335a-11: zhing skyes ma'i gzugs kyis rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams rol par byed cing /
T02D1449:335a-13: rab tu rgyu bar byed do //
T02D1449:335a-14: de bzhin du nang du yang /
T02D1449:335a-15: de rnams kyi zhal la sogs pa yod de /
T02D1449:335a-16: rtsa thams cad nyid bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
T02D1449:335a-17: las byung nas rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi mthar
T02D1449:335a-18: thug pa na zhal du rab tu gsal bar 'gyur
T02D1449:335a-19: la / de'i myu gu rnams ni so so'i phyogs mang po rnams so //
T02D1449:335a-20: khams kyis gtsos pa las sku mdog dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1449:335a-21: de ltar yang so dang sen mo ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-22: skra dang ba spu ni nag po dang /
T02D1449:335a-23: pags pa'i dri ma ni dmar nag dang /
T02D1449:335a-24: sha ni dmar po'i mdog dang /
T02D1449:335a-25: chu rgyus rnams ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-26: rus pa'i phreng ba ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-27: mchin pa ni shin tu nag po dang /
T02D1449:335a-29: mig dag ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-31: mkhris pa ni ser po dang /
T02D1449:335a-32: glo ba ni dmar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-33: rgyu ma dang gnye ma ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-34: lto ba ni sngo bsangs dang /
T02D1449:335a-35: bshang ba ni ser po dang /
T02D1449:335a-36: mtshams mtha' ni dmar dkar dang /
T02D1449:335a-37: bad kan ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-38: rnag ni zla ba ltar dkar ser dang /
T02D1449:335a-40: rdul ni me'i kha dog dang /
T02D1449:335a-41: tshil bu ni dkar po dang /
T02D1449:335a-42: mchi ma ni mu tig gi 'bras bu ltar dkar
T02D1449:335a-43: ba dang mchil ma ni gnag cing dkar ba dang
T02D1449:335a-44: / ngar snabs ni ser po dang dkar po'o zhes pa ni kha dog gi dbye ba'o //
T02D1449:335a-46: 'khyog bo'i gzugs nyid kyis g-yon dang g-yas su rab tu rgyu bas gnas pa ste /
T02D1449:335a-47: g-yas brkyang bal sogs pa'i gzugs su grub pa'o //
T02D1449:335a-48: mtshon cha 'di rnams kyi gri gug dang thod pa
T02D1449:335a-49: rnam par dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri
T02D1449:335a-50: ma 'byed par byed pa'i lhan skyes kyi rang bzhin
T02D1449:335b-1: rnam rtog dri ma rnam gcod pa'i //
T02D1449:335b-2: yang dag myong ba'i bdag nyid thob //
T02D1449:335b-3: gzung dang 'dzin las nges par grol //
T02D1449:335b-4: lhan cig skyes dkar nges pa'o //
T02D1449:335b-5: reg ba tsam gyis 'jig rten la //
T02D1449:335b-6: sangs rgyas 'bras bu nyid sbyin byed //
T02D1449:335b-7: mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcur bshad pa'i //
T02D1449:335b-8: 'khor lor son slad rtog pa ni //
T02D1449:335b-9: mi phyed la sogs rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1449:335b-10: dus kun du ni 'gro la gnas //
T02D1449:335b-11: khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo che //
T02D1449:335b-12: nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan //
T02D1449:335b-13: rang lus dbus son rtsa rnams ni //
T02D1449:335b-14: dpa' mo yin na gal te 'dir //
T02D1449:335b-15: ji ltar rmongs shing 'khrul bar gyur //
T02D1449:335b-16: pull'i ra sogs gnas rigs na //
T02D1449:335b-17: phyi rol yongs su dor 'gyur te //
T02D1449:335b-18: sgom pa de ltar 'khrul pa yin //
T02D1449:335b-19: nang gi rnal 'byor ldan pa las //
T02D1449:335b-21: zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
T02D1449:335b-22: cho ga dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa
T02D1449:335b-23: gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las//
T02D1449:335b-24: rgyas par bstan pa bdun pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o /
T02D1449:335b-26: // / da ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1449:335b-29: sbyin sreg la sogs pa nang du gzhag pa de rnams rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1449:335b-30: de nas gang yang rung zhes bya bal sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:335b-31: 'di rnams kyang sngar brjod pa nyid kyi phyir go sla'o //
T02D1449:335b-32: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor du rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1449:335b-33: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
T02D1449:335b-35: byang chub che zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1449:335b-36: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D1449:335b-37: rnam par dag pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rtsa gang
T02D1449:335b-38: yin pa 'di rnams ni rnam pa de nyid kyis
T02D1449:335b-39: ye shes dang / thugs dang gsung dang sku dang
T02D1449:335b-40: dam tshig gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1449:335b-41: la sogs pa rnams su rnam par gzhag go zhes
T02D1449:335b-42: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs
T02D1449:335b-43: ye shes dang / pa yin no // de su'i rgyu yin zhen /
T02D1449:335b-44: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med cing dmigs pa
T02D1449:335b-45: med pa sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha'
T02D1449:335b-46: 'gro ma'i yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:335b-47: d'i ni nam mkhar 'gro ba ste /
T02D1449:335b-48: sangs rgyas dbyings su rab tu brtags //
T02D1449:336a-2: mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1449:336a-4: ye shes lnga'i nam mkha' chen po la rgyu ba ni rtsa rnams te /
T02D1449:336a-5: de'i phyir de nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:336a-6: de la reg pa las gnyis ka la rnam par
T02D1449:336a-7: mi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid 'char ba'i phyir
T02D1449:336a-8: ro // brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02D1449:336a-9: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
T02D1449:336a-10: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1449:336a-11: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa dang /
T02D1449:336a-13: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1449:336a-14: de nyid kyi phyir nyams dga' ba ste /
T02D1449:336a-15: phyi rol gyi rdul tshon la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:336a-16: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la sgo bzhi yod pa
T02D1449:336a-17: ji lta ba bzhin du nang du yang yin no
T02D1449:336a-18: zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad ba /
T02D1449:336a-19: de la lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams ni /
T02D1449:336a-24: yang na ji skad gsungs pa'i zhes pa /
T02D1449:336a-25: sngar gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgo gsum po rnams kyi cha shas las bzhir 'gyur te /
T02D1449:336a-26: g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa ni thugs kyi sgo ste dang po'o //
T02D1449:336a-27: bdag gi gdan la sogs pa bzhi ni gsung gi sgo ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D1449:336a-28: dgu'i bdag nyid can sku'i sgo ni 'og dang steng gi dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1449:336a-29: de ltar sgo bzhi la brten pa'i ka ba gnyis
T02D1449:336a-30: gnyis dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ka ba brgyad
T02D1449:336a-31: do // nang gi mig la sogs pa'i rtsa'i ka ba rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1449:336a-32: ji ltar phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
T02D1449:336a-33: yin pa de bzhin du mnyam pa'i dngos pos lus
T02D1449:336a-34: kyi dkyil 'khor yang gru bzhir shes bar bya'o //
T02D1449:336a-37: 'di ni lus 'di ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02D1449:336a-38: rkang ba'i 'og nas gtsug tor gyi mthar tshad dang
T02D1449:336a-39: ldan pa de bzhin du lag pa brkyang pa na
T02D1449:336a-41: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni thugs dang gsung dang
T02D1449:336a-42: sku'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor lo gsum la nyi
T02D1449:336a-43: shu rtsa bzhi ste gzhan no //
T02D1449:336a-44: de bzhin du nang du yang thugs dang gsung dang
T02D1449:336b-0: sku'i rtsa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa @336b spyi
T02D1449:336b-1: bo la sogs pa nas phyin pa'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D1449:336b-2: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor
T02D1449:336b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdor bstan pa ste /
T02D1449:336b-6: de yang rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i
T02D1449:336b-7: steng du gnas pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la
T02D1449:336b-8: gnas pa'i sna tshogs padmar bshad cing khong du chud
T02D1449:336b-9: par bya bzhin bde kho na bzhin du nang du
T02D1449:336b-10: yang lus kyi dkyil 'khor la dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan
T02D1449:336b-11: ma ni / bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1449:336b-12: rkang mthil du ni gnas pa'i rlung //
T02D1449:336b-13: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1449:336b-14: mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can gyis //
T02D1449:336b-15: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan
T02D1449:336b-16: ma'i de kho na nyid rgyas par gsungs pa bshad
T02D1449:336b-17: par bya ste / rkang ba'i mthil du ste rkang ba'i 'og go //
T02D1449:336b-18: de rlung gnas pa ste gzhu'i rnam pa nyid kyis
T02D1449:336b-19: khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams pa nyid kyi
T02D1449:336b-21: rang gi don la aan te bee kri ta lta bu'o //
T02D1449:336b-22: rkang pa'i gnas kyi bdag nyid can gyi bya ba ni be rambha zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:336b-23: 'dis ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi byed pa po'i dbyibs kyang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1449:336b-24: de'i steng du yang yin pa sum mdo'i phyogs te /
T02D1449:336b-26: der bud med dang skyes pa dag gi /
T02D1449:336b-27: rakta dang nor bu grol ba nyid las me'i dkyil
T02D1449:336b-28: 'khor gru gsum pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'bar ba rnam
T02D1449:336b-29: par gnas so // de'i steng du sngags kyi phreng
T02D1449:336b-30: ba zlum po zhu zhing sbyor ba las chu'i dkyil
T02D1449:336b-31: par gnas so // 'khor te / lto ba'i phyogs su rang bzhin gyis gnas so //
T02D1449:336b-32: de'i steng du snying gar gru bzhi pa gser lta bu'i sa'i dkyil 'khor yod de /
T02D1449:336b-33: de'i steng gang yin pa mgrin pa'i cha ni /
T02D1449:336b-34: rnam grangs gzhan du na sgal tshigs te /
T02D1449:336b-35: de nyid ni ri rab tu shes par bya ste /
T02D1449:336b-36: mig la sogs pa'i rtse mo brgyad dang ldan zhing /
T02D1449:336b-37: de'i 'dab ma bzhi bo rin po che'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1449:336b-38: ri rab gang yin pa 'di las mgo bo'i dbus
T02D1449:336b-39: der mi phyed ma la sdogs pa'i rtsa sum cu
T02D1449:336b-40: rtsa gnyis po de nyid ni sna tshogs padmar te
T02D1449:336b-41: / bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:336b-42: de'i nang du a'a li dang k'a li dbyangs dang
T02D1449:337a-0: gsal byed kyi bdag nyid can byang chub kyi @337a
T02D1449:337a-1: * // sems sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi god bu klad pa nyid ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1449:337a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi khyad par gyi gdan no //
T02D1449:337a-3: gdan rnams rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni bye brag
T02D1449:337a-4: gi rgyud kha cig tu ma gsungs par rtogs par
T02D1449:337a-5: bya'o // rnam par dag ba'i de kho na nyid
T02D1449:337a-6: ni thams cad kyi tshe smra bar bya ba ma
T02D1449:337a-7: yin pa'i de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:337a-8: gang zag gi mos pa'i dbang las gang na rnams su rab tu phye ba yin no //
T02D1449:337a-9: de nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo gsum du gnas pa'i
T02D1449:337a-10: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la kha cig
T02D1449:337a-12: kha cig tu nyi ma'i gdan no zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1449:337a-13: de yi dbus su zhes pa la sogs pa la //
T02D1449:337a-14: de yi ste klad pa'i dbus su gzhom du med
T02D1449:337a-15: cing 'gyur ba med pa ham gi yi ge ste
T02D1449:337a-16: / zhu'i bdud rtsi rgyas pa las thig le'i tshor
T02D1449:337a-17: ba bsil ba ni thig le zhes brjod par bya'o
T02D1449:337a-19: g-yo ba'i bdag nyid dngos po thams cad du 'gyur
T02D1449:337a-20: ba nyid kyi phyir rdzogs shing rab tu gnas pa'i
T02D1449:337a-21: gnas rnams kyi de nyid sa bon gyi gzugs kyis
T02D1449:337a-22: gsal zhing / don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs kyis ni mi gsal ba'o //
T02D1449:337a-39: lus can rnams kyi lus ni /
T02D1449:337a-40: dang po de kho na las skyes pa yin te /
T02D1449:337a-41: pha dang ma snyoms par zhugs ba'i dbang gis gzhan gyi tshon /
T02D1449:337a-42: bdun rtsi kho na zhu bzhin pa rnam par gnas pa yin no //
T02D1449:337a-43: de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1449:337a-44: chos nyid yin pa nyid kyis chos rnams la khyab pa na /
T02D1449:337a-45: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba na yang de gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:337a-47: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa nyid kyis /
T02D1449:337a-48: 'byung ba'i dngos po 'di rnams nyid kyis 'gog pa grub pa yin te /
T02D1449:337a-51: sems kyi rang bzhin rnam pa ni //
T02D1449:337a-52: 'khor bar gnas par shes par bya //
T02D1449:337b-1: skye ba dang 'gag pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang dngos po nyid la dmigs pa ma yin la /
T02D1449:337b-2: snang ba la dmigs pa yang sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1449:337b-3: dngos po thams cad ni skyes par smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1449:337b-4: ma skyes shing ma 'gag par shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:337b-5: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa gsungs pa /
T02D1449:337b-6: de nyid kyis te bde ba chen po'i 'khor los rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du'am /
T02D1449:337b-7: dkyil 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi me dga' bar byed pas na'o //
T02D1449:337b-8: n'a da ni sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i ze'u 'brur gnas pa'i aa yig ste /
T02D1449:337b-9: 'byed par byed pa ni rang gi gnas las g-yo ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis song ste /
T02D1449:337b-10: bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung ba la sred pa nyid kyi
T02D1449:337b-11: phyir 'khyog por byas nas rtsa ba nas 'byin par
T02D1449:337b-12: byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1449:337b-14: n'a da yi ge kun gyi ste //
T02D1449:337b-15: byed pa gcig nyid thob pa na //
T02D1449:337b-16: gang phyir ngag tshig rab dbye bas //
T02D1449:337b-17: lte ba'i phyogs su rnam par gnas //
T02D1449:337b-18: rlung dang nye rlung 'khor lo yi //
T02D1449:337b-19: ldang sogs bya ba la brten nas //
T02D1449:337b-20: rengs pa la sogs rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1449:337b-21: 'jug cing gzhan pa nyid la brten //
T02D1449:337b-22: dbu ma'i rang bzhin rnam pa bcu'i //
T02D1449:337b-23: de nyid brten par brjod par bya //
T02D1449:337b-24: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las //
T02D1449:337b-25: de ni bde chen byed pa'o //
T02D1449:337b-27: phung sogs dbang po sreg par byed //
T02D1449:337b-28: bskal ba'i me gzugs nyid 'di ni //
T02D1449:337b-29: kun gyi sdud dang byed po yin //
T02D1449:337b-30: zla ba thig le'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1449:337b-31: 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa po //
T02D1449:337b-32: bde chen 'khor lo chen por ni //
T02D1449:337b-33: gzhom med yi ge'i gzugs 'chang ba //
T02D1449:337b-34: kha ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D1449:337b-35: byang chub sems las byung ba'i 'od //
T02D1449:337b-36: spros te rin chen 'khor lo'i mthar //
T02D1449:337b-37: 'dzag par byed cing rnam par gnas //
T02D1449:337b-38: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog / de nyid mchog gi yi ge ste //
T02D1449:337b-39: de nyid kun la khyab ste 'di //
T02D1449:337b-40: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1449:337b-42: dga' ba'i gnas kyi cha ru 'gyur //
T02D1449:337b-43: de nyid dpyid kyi thig le yi //
T02D1449:337b-44: rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya //
T02D1449:338a-0: de'i phyir de gnyis kyis gdan bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyi @338a * //
T02D1449:338a-2: sbrul ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs par bshad par gyur pa yin te /
T02D1449:338a-3: phyi rol du yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rang
T02D1449:338a-4: 'dra dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par
T02D1449:338a-6: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1449:338a-7: de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1449:338a-8: rten gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nges pa'i tshig gsungs te
T02D1449:338a-9: / snying po ste rtsa dang khams dang dpyid dang
T02D1449:338a-10: thig le'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa'
T02D1449:338a-11: bo dang dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag
T02D1449:338a-12: mo'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir na
T02D1449:338a-13: / / lus kho na dkyil 'khor du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1449:338a-14: manda ni nye ba'i tshig ste /
T02D1449:338a-16: la ti lad'i rkyen byas pa las so //
T02D1449:338a-17: rtsa chen sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba la
T02D1449:338a-18: sogs pas nang gi bdag nyid kyi rnam par dag
T02D1449:338a-19: pa gsungs te / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D1449:338a-20: sum cu rtsa bdun po gang yin pa 'di rnams
T02D1449:338a-21: ni rig pa dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1449:338a-22: de rnam par dag pa las /
T02D1449:338a-23: sngar gsungs pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo kho na dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1449:338a-24: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpa' bo'i rnam par dag pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:338a-25: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1449:338a-26: nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de nyid ni rin thang
T02D1449:338a-28: rin po che ste lha mo'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1449:338a-29: dkyil 'khor de'i snying po 'dzin par byed pa ni
T02D1449:338a-30: dpa' po'i dkyil 'khor te dkyil 'khor rnams pa gnyis
T02D1449:338a-31: so // phyi rol du ni gru bzhi pa la sogs pa yin la /
T02D1449:338a-32: nang du snying ga'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo gsum la sogs pa'o //
T02D1449:338a-33: 'dir phyi rol du spyi bo la sogs pa ni dz'a landha ra la sogs pa yin la /
T02D1449:338a-34: nang du ni rtsa dang khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1449:338a-35: dkyil 'khor 'di rnams kyang 'di nyid gcig pu'i ma yin gyi /
T02D1449:338a-36: sna tshogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po 'di rnams kyang de'i dkyil 'khor du shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:338a-38: sna tshogs khyab cing rnam par gnas //
T02D1449:338a-40: yang na phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs dang
T02D1449:338a-41: sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi ste mchod pa de
T02D1449:338a-42: rnams kyis nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
T02D1449:338b-0: nang du bum pa ni ka p'a @338b la'i nang
T02D1449:338b-1: du bdud rtsi lnga rnams bde ba'i mchod pa'i slad
T02D1449:338b-3: 'dir phyi rol du gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i
T02D1449:338b-4: yon tan lnga rnams kyis dbang po'i sgo rnams mchod
T02D1449:338b-5: par bya la / nang du ni grub pa ste
T02D1449:338b-6: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rdzas nam mkha' lngar 'dzag
T02D1449:338b-7: pa'i rdzas rnams su gnas pa'o //
T02D1449:338b-9: phyi rol du ni gzugs sgra sogs //
T02D1449:338b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
T02D1449:338b-11: phyi rol du sbom po dang phra mo ni dam
T02D1449:338b-12: tshig sbyin pa'i slad du slob ma rnams la ston
T02D1449:338b-13: par byed do // 'dir ni sbom po dang phra
T02D1449:338b-14: mo'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1449:338b-16: 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub par byed pas na /
T02D1449:338b-17: sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang
T02D1449:338b-18: dam tshig ste sbyin zhing shar ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis
T02D1449:338b-19: dkyil 'khor 'di kho na las go 'phang thob par
T02D1449:338b-20: 'gyur ro // don 'di ni sbom po dang phra ba la brten nas gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1449:338b-21: de la sbom po ni khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1449:338b-22: phra ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1449:338b-23: yang na sbom po ni sgro las byung ba'i dri ma'i rdzas rnams dang /
T02D1449:338b-24: phra mo ni byang chub kyi snying po zhu bar byed pa'o //
T02D1449:338b-26: sbom dang phra ba'i rab dbye bas //
T02D1449:338b-27: dngos por rtogs pa rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1449:338b-28: rags pa'i rdzas ni rnam dgu ste //
T02D1449:338b-29: phra mo'i tshil bu grub pa'i rdzas //
T02D1449:338b-30: gzhan pa zhu byed rdzas dbye bas //
T02D1449:338b-32: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bos sems can gyi don du nyan thos dang /
T02D1449:338b-34: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1449:338b-35: tshangs pa la sogs pa sbrul bar byed la /
T02D1449:338b-36: nang du ni 'dzag par byed do zhes pas sgo dgu po rnams ni /
T02D1449:338b-37: nyan thos dang mig la sogs pa'i sgo rnams ni rang sangs rgyas te /
T02D1449:338b-38: 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:338b-39: dga' ba la sogs pa rnams ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la /
T02D1449:338b-40: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1449:338b-41: 'di rnams thams cad dkyil 'khor de nyid las rdzogs
T02D1449:338b-42: par 'gyur ro zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi nges pa'o
T02D1449:338b-43: // nang gi khu ba la sogs dang //
T02D1449:338b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi sbyin sreg gsungs te /
T02D1449:339a-1: rol du til brdung ba'i slob dpon rnams kyi dam
T02D1449:339a-2: tshig gi me'i kha nas ye shes kyi me tshim
T02D1449:339a-3: par byed pa de kho na bzhin du gzugs la
T02D1449:339a-4: sogs pa'i yul rnams kyis dang /
T02D1449:339a-5: so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan dag dang snyoms
T02D1449:339a-6: par 'jug pa las skyes pa'i khu ba la sogs
T02D1449:339a-7: pa rnams kyis phung po la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1449:339a-8: dang de'i sras kyi dkyil 'khor tshim par bya'o //
T02D1449:339a-9: shes rab kyi me ni gtum mo ste /
T02D1449:339a-10: 'bar zhing rno ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:339a-11: bsreg cing 'bar ba'i phyir 'di ni sbyin sreg tu shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:339a-12: skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang //
T02D1449:339a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:339a-14: 'dir sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis phung po la rnams ni mkha' 'gro lnga dang /
T02D1449:339a-15: skye mched drug ni 'khor los sgyur ba drug dang /
T02D1449:339a-16: khams rnams ni thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1449:339a-17: rtsa sum cu rtsa drug rnams ni ye shes kyi lha mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1449:339a-18: de ltar lha la sogs pa'i gzugs can 'di rnams
T02D1449:339a-19: kyi shes rab dang thabs gnyis po sbyor ba las
T02D1449:339a-20: mchod sbyin gang yin pa de ni mchod par shes
T02D1449:339a-22: rang bzhin med pa'i gnas bsgom pas //
T02D1449:339a-23: lha yi gzugs su bsgom de ni //
T02D1449:339a-24: mchod pa chen po'i mchod pa ste //
T02D1449:339a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1449:339a-28: de yis de rnams mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1449:339a-30: spyi bo yin thod pa ni //
T02D1449:339a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad pa'i sbyin sreg gi yan lag rnams gsungs te /
T02D1449:339a-32: spyi bo'i thod pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni mgo bo'i thod pa ste /
T02D1449:339a-33: de nyid zla ba'i bsreg rdzas rnams kyi gzhir gyur
T02D1449:339a-34: pa nyid kyi phyir bsreg rdzas kyi snod yin gyi
T02D1449:339a-36: de bzhin du g-yon dang g-yas su son pa'i la
T02D1449:339a-37: la n'a dang ra sa n'a ra 'og tu rdzas
T02D1449:339a-38: zhu ba 'bab pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du dgang
T02D1449:339a-39: gzar dang blugs gzar du shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:339a-40: sprul ba'i 'khor lo ste ba'i dkyil 'khor ni me thab ste /
T02D1449:339a-41: der me lhung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1449:339a-42: bsrub bya dang srub byed yang dag par sbyor ba las /
T02D1449:339a-43: las kyi ched du gang du 'byung ba ni tshangs ba'i me ste //
T02D1449:339b-0: de ni sum @339b mdo dang de las 'og tu gsang bar gru gsum du 'bar ba yin no //
T02D1449:339b-1: rang bzhin gyis zhes ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1449:339b-2: phyi rol du yang tshangs pa'i me ni zhi ba can la bstod par byed do //
T02D1449:339b-3: de yang gtsub shing gtsubs pa las byung bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1449:339b-5: n'a da sngags zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1449:339b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bzlas pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:339b-7: gang 'di ni sngar gsungs pa'i lte ba'i gnas las 'thon pa'i phyir srog gi rlung ste /
T02D1449:339b-8: de nyid ni sngags thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir sngags zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1449:339b-9: de nyid kyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pha
T02D1449:339b-10: gang gi tshe 'khor mor yin pa de ni bzlas
T02D1449:339b-11: pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:339b-12: de nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin gyis bzlas pa 'di
T02D1449:339b-13: ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong bar gsungs
T02D1449:339b-15: gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams /
T02D1449:339b-16: srog dang rtsol ba la brten nas //
T02D1449:339b-17: gsang sngags rgyal po zlos bzhin du //
T02D1449:339b-18: mi shes bsam gtan bsam bya spangs //
T02D1449:339b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgom pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:339b-23: phyi rol du ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
T02D1449:339b-24: la dmigs nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi so sor
T02D1449:339b-25: snang ba ste nang du ni /
T02D1449:339b-26: sprul pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhir phyag rgya'i
T02D1449:339b-27: tshogs la sogs pa so sor snang ba de nyid
T02D1449:339b-28: bsgom pa ste / rang bzhin na med pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'am /
T02D1449:339b-29: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid ni bsgom pa'o //
T02D1449:339b-31: dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos //
T02D1449:339b-32: bsgom pa bsgom pa min pa nyid //
T02D1449:339b-33: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1449:339b-34: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1449:339b-36: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo 'di //
T02D1449:339b-37: rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sogs //
T02D1449:339b-38: zhes bya bas nye bar bsdu ba gsungs te /
T02D1449:339b-39: rgyal ba rnams kyi ni sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1449:339b-40: ste 'di rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste
T02D1449:339b-45: bsgom pa zhes brjod pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1449:339b-46: ngo bo de rang bzhin gyi gnas pa yin gyis
T02D1449:340a-2: bcos ma ni lhan cig skyes pa la bzhugs pa'i don kho na bstan pa yin te /
T02D1449:340a-3: sems can thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1449:340a-4: dkyil 'khor 'di rnams phyi rol du slob dpon gyis
T02D1449:340a-5: byin gyis brlabs pa yin na nang du su zhig
T02D1449:340a-7: dkyil 'khor dbang po'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1449:340a-8: sems kyi rgyal po slob dpon no //
T02D1449:340a-10: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1449:340a-11: sems kyi rdo rje 'chang gang yin pa de ni sngar gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1449:340a-12: mi phyed pa las khong du chud par bya ste /
T02D1449:340a-13: de nyid ni slob dpon no //
T02D1449:340a-14: de ni yang dag par rig pa'i cha byad kyis
T02D1449:340a-15: rgyu ba'i phyir slob dpon zhes brjod par bya ste
T02D1449:340a-17: dkyil 'khor dbang po'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1449:340a-18: zhes bya bas gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1449:340a-19: 'dir la sogs pa'i sgra phyis par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1449:340a-20: shin tu bstan pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:340a-21: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ji skad du gsungs pa
T02D1449:340a-22: thams cad ni 'di nyid du khong du chud par
T02D1449:340a-23: bya'o // gal te 'dir gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams ni /
T02D1449:340a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad rnams dang /
T02D1449:340a-27: sa yongs su gzung ba dang /
T02D1449:340a-32: mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1449:340a-34: gtor ma la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1449:340a-35: de rnams nyid ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor du khong du chud par bya zhing /
T02D1449:340a-36: shes bar bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1449:340a-37: de ltar ni dbus kyi rtsa ni thig dang /
T02D1449:340a-38: rdul tshon ni khu ba dang /
T02D1449:340a-39: gcin la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1449:340a-40: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhis bsdus pa'i rtsa bcu'i sa
T02D1449:340a-41: de rnams su thim pa la sogs pa'i rim pas
T02D1449:340a-42: yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa yongs su gzungs ba
T02D1449:340a-43: dang / 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas spyan drang ba la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1449:340a-44: ye shes kyi rim pa ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang /
T02D1449:340a-45: rdo rje nor bu'i bum pa las padma'i gdan la
T02D1449:340a-46: gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo'i 'khor lo la rgyun
T02D1449:340a-47: lhung bas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1449:340a-48: 'di sa ni 'dzags pa lces myang ba ni gtor
T02D1449:340b-0: ma'o @340b zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D1449:340b-1: kyi chog dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel ba
T02D1449:340b-2: gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las rgyas par bstan
T02D1449:340b-3: pa brgyad pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o /
T02D1449:340b-5: // / gang gong du sngags bzlas par gsungs pa'i sngags 'di ni ci zhig ce na /
T02D1449:340b-6: de lta bu khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1449:340b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par bstan pa dgu ba gsungs te /
T02D1449:340b-8: gang yang rung zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1449:340b-9: gang zhig su yang rung ba'i sems can gyis rang bzhin gyis grub ba'i sngags ni btu ba ste /
T02D1449:340b-10: de las sngags thams cad rab tu skye'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1449:340b-11: de la phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bris te /
T02D1449:340b-12: de'i nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ri mo byas nas /
T02D1449:340b-13: de'i dbus kyi lte ba la aa yig go //
T02D1449:340b-14: 'dab ma rnams la brgyad brgyad kyi dbye bas a'a li dang k'a li bkod pa'i bzhi pa dang /
T02D1449:340b-15: lnga ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis lnga ba'i lnga
T02D1449:340b-16: ba la sogs pa'i spros pas rtsa ba'i sngags btu
T02D1449:340b-17: bar bya'o // nang du ni gru gsum pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni /
T02D1449:340b-18: rtsa ba'i dbus kyi rtsa ba brgyad po a'a li
T02D1449:340b-19: dang k'a li dang bcas pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i
T02D1449:340b-20: aa yig ni bcom ldan 'das yi ge dang tshig
T02D1449:340b-21: dang ngag ma lus pa dang ngag chen po'i gzugs
T02D1449:340b-22: kyis rnam par gnas pa de nyid las yi ge
T02D1449:340b-24: de rnams kyang tshig skyes bar byed pa yin la /
T02D1449:340b-25: de rnams kyis kyang ngag dang /
T02D1449:340b-26: de rnams kyis kyang ngag chen po ste /
T02D1449:340b-27: ji srid du 'jig rten pa'i dngos po'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D1449:340b-28: chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o zhes pas /
T02D1449:340b-29: 'di thams cad ni yi ge las rab tu skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T02D1449:340b-30: de yang lte ba dang gsang ba dag ni rten
T02D1449:340b-31: dang brten pa'i dngos por brjod pa de nyid kyi
T02D1449:340b-32: phyir / sprul ba'i 'khor lo kho na sngags kyi rten yin no zhes brjod do //
T02D1449:340b-33: de ltar na aa yi ga ni ris med pa ste /
T02D1449:340b-34: aa yig las rab tu byung ba'i sngags rnams ni /
T02D1449:340b-35: mthun pa'i gzugs kyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D1449:340b-36: kyi tshogs byed cing rab tu 'jug pa yin gyi
T02D1449:340b-37: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
T02D1449:340b-38: yongs su shes pa'i de kho na nyid ni sngags so //
T02D1449:340b-40: mchog tu mi 'gyur gcig pu pa'i //
T02D1449:341a-2: de yongs shes pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1449:341a-3: sngags rnams 'dir ni las byed do //
T02D1449:341a-6: de nyid phyir na sngags rnams ni //
T02D1449:341a-7: yi ge'i rang gzugs su mi 'dod //
T02D1449:341a-8: gang phyir rtsa yang 'khyog por ni //
T02D1449:341a-9: byed pa tsam du mi nus so //
T02D1449:341a-12: sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can gyi //
T02D1449:341a-13: las kyi tshogs ni byed pa yin //
T02D1449:341a-14: zhes bya bas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1449:341a-15: yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid //
T02D1449:341a-16: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:341a-17: a'a li rnams thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis gnyis nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1449:341a-18: de la a'a li'i sde tshan dor bar byas pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1449:341a-19: ra dang ksha dag 'og dang steng du 'god pa'i phyir na /
T02D1449:341a-20: k'a li sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:341a-21: drug cu rtsa bzhir yang dag par rtogs par bya la /
T02D1449:341a-22: brten pa ni dngos sun yi ge lnga bcu rnams so //
T02D1449:341a-23: gzhan gyi sde pa la grags /
T02D1449:341a-24: pa'i rig byed la sogs pa rig pa'i gnas bcu bzhi dang /
T02D1449:341a-25: rang gi snge pa la grags pa'i rig pa'i gnas lnga la brten nas /
T02D1449:341a-26: aa yig ni yi ge de rnams nyid kyis 'jug par byed do //
T02D1449:341a-28: dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na //
T02D1449:341a-29: bcu yis ma bcings gang yin pa //
T02D1449:341a-30: de ni bcings med shes bya gang //
T02D1449:341a-31: de nyid mchog gi go 'phang rig / dbyangs gsal yi ge rnams kyang ni //
T02D1449:341a-33: phan tshun sbyor phyir aas bcings par //
T02D1449:341a-34: gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla //
T02D1449:341a-36: spyod pa'i rig byed yan lag bzhir //
T02D1449:341a-37: de yi bkod pa rgyas par te //
T02D1449:341a-38: rnying pa'i chos kyi bstan bcos su //
T02D1449:341a-39: rig pa bcu bzhi 'di rnams so //
T02D1449:341a-40: sgra dang gtan tshigs rig pa dang //
T02D1449:341a-41: de bzhin kho nar nad dang ni //
T02D1449:341a-42: gso ba dang ni bzo rig gnyis //
T02D1449:341a-43: rig pa'i gnas ni lnga po'o //
T02D1449:341a-44: 'di rnams thams cad ni aa yig las 'byin par
T02D1449:341a-45: byed do zhes pas yi ge thams cad kyi dbang
T02D1449:341a-46: phyug ste / de dor nas de rnams 'don pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1449:341a-48: rig byed sogs su yang dag gnas //
T02D1449:341a-49: zhes bya bas gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1449:341a-50: zhi ba dang drag po dang gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gyi sngags dang /
T02D1449:341a-51: phyir bzlog pa la sogs pa dang //
T02D1449:341b-0: @341b phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dang /
T02D1449:341b-1: sngar bshad pa'i rig pa'i gnas rnams te /
T02D1449:341b-2: 'di rnams su yi ge'i byed pa rab tu 'jug
T02D1449:341b-3: gi / gzhan du na cung zad kyang yod pa
T02D1449:341b-4: ma yin no zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1449:341b-6: sngags btu ba 'di ni thams cad du rnam pa
T02D1449:341b-7: mi rtog pa yin par rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la
T02D1449:341b-8: sogs pa rnams su khong du chud par bya ste
T02D1449:341b-10: gzhan du cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D1449:341b-11: zhes bya bas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1449:341b-12: sngags 'di ni ci zhig /'khor ni su /
T02D1449:341b-14: grangs ni ji tsam zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1449:341b-15: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha / dbus
T02D1449:341b-16: su son pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung
T02D1449:341b-17: gsungs te / sde pa so so las yi ge dang po blangs pa ste /
T02D1449:341b-18: a'a li k'a li gang yin pa ni ngag ma lus pa'i rang bzhin te rgyu yin la /
T02D1449:341b-19: sde tshan ni brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02D1449:341b-20: de nyid ni yi ge lnga bcu ste /
T02D1449:341b-21: a'a li k'a li rnams mnyam du byas pa las
T02D1449:341b-22: ni drug cu rtsa bzhir yang dag par rtogs par
T02D1449:341b-23: bya ste / rtsa so so la yi ge re
T02D1449:341b-24: re bsams pa las sprul pa'i 'khor lo la rang
T02D1449:341b-25: bzhin gyis grub pa'i yi ge lnga bcu po 'di
T02D1449:341b-26: rnams nyid brgyad pa brgyad kyis dbye bas tha dad
T02D1449:341b-27: pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha drug
T02D1449:341b-28: cu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1449:341b-29: phyogs dang phyogs bral brgyad rnams su rnam par gnas par shes par bya'o //
T02D1449:341b-30: de rnams dbus kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbus kyi gtso bo gsungs te /
T02D1449:341b-31: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin can gyi rtsa de
T02D1449:341b-32: rnams kyi dbus su mchog gi dbang phyug ste mchog
T02D1449:341b-33: gi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1449:341b-34: yi ge de rnams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur
T02D1449:341b-35: ba'o // de bzhin du ma ning gi sa bon bzhi po yongs su dor nas /
T02D1449:341b-36: aa yig la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag bcu gnyis so //
T02D1449:341b-37: bsregs pa'i sa bon bzhi po ni /
T02D1449:341b-42: ka yig la sogs pa ha yig gi mthar thug pa /
T02D1449:341b-43: ma yig thig les mtshan pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams so //
T02D1449:341b-44: sa la sogs pa ha yig gi mthar thug pa
T02D1449:341b-45: rnams ni khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams te
T02D1449:341b-46: / ksha yig ni zad pa'i mkha' 'gro yin la /
T02D1449:342a-0: @342a * // dbus su aa yig ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1449:342a-1: de'i phyir 'di ni sde tshan brgyad po 'di rnams kyis bskor ba yin la /
T02D1449:342a-2: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i aa yig kho na sngags thams cad kyi rgyu ste /
T02D1449:342a-3: des na 'dis sngags 'byin par byed pa yin no //
T02D1449:342a-4: aa yig ces bya ba la sogs pas de'i phan yon gsungs te /
T02D1449:342a-5: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bor byed pa'i phyir don chen no //
T02D1449:342a-6: de rnams de kho nas byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1449:342a-7: sde tshan rnams kyi gtso bo'o //
T02D1449:342a-10: gang zhig sngags kyi tshig tshad mar smra ba rnams
T02D1449:342a-11: kyang de nyid las skyes shing byung ba yin no
T02D1449:342a-12: // de ltar na rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi
T02D1449:342a-13: sngags thams cad kho na'i dbung gnyen no zhes bya
T02D1449:342a-14: // bar gnas so // gang zhig ral gri mig sman dang //
T02D1449:342a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas las rab 'byams kyis
T02D1449:342a-16: dngos grub rnams kyis 'di yongs su shes pa kho
T02D1449:342a-17: na las yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no
T02D1449:342a-18: zhes gsungs te / ral gri dang /
T02D1449:342a-19: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang rdo rje dang
T02D1449:342a-20: padma'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub lnga po rnams
T02D1449:342a-21: ral gris nye bar mtshon pa nyid las so //
T02D1449:342a-22: gang gis grib ma nyams par gyur pa de ni mig sman gyi dngos grub ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D1449:342a-23: gang gis skad cig tsam gyis dpag tshad brgya stong
T02D1449:342a-24: du 'gro bar byed pa de ni rkang pa byug
T02D1449:342a-25: pa'i dngos grub ste gsum pa'o //
T02D1449:342a-26: gang gis sa la gnas pa'i gter mthong ba'am /
T02D1449:342a-27: bug pa'i sgor rab tu zhugs nas lha ma yin
T02D1449:342a-28: gyi bu mo 'gugs par byed pa de ni sa
T02D1449:342a-29: 'og gi dngos grub ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1449:342a-30: gang gis shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gnod sbyin mo la longs spyod pa de ni /
T02D1449:342a-31: gnod sbyin gyi lus can ma'i dngos grub ste lnga pa'o //
T02D1449:342a-32: gang zhig khar bcug pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1449:342a-33: zhing thams cad du 'phur nas sangs rgyas rnams las
T02D1449:342a-34: chos nyan par byed pa de ni ri lu'i dngos
T02D1449:342a-36: gang gis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las brgyad bo sgrub par byed pa ni /
T02D1449:342a-37: 'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu ba'i dngos grub ste bdun pa'o //
T02D1449:342a-38: gang gis rdo dang zangs la sogs pa gser du
T02D1449:342a-39: byed pa de ni dngul chu'i dngos grub ste brgyad
T02D1449:342a-40: pa'o zhes pa grub chen brgyad po rnams so //
T02D1449:342a-41: gzhan yang lha'i spyan la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1449:342b-1: sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams te /
T02D1449:342b-2: sde tshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'i dngos grub ste de
T02D1449:342b-3: rnams ni dbyangs dang po kho na las byung ba
T02D1449:342b-4: yin gyi so so'i spros pas de sprub [*sgrub?] pa'i
T02D1449:342b-5: 'bad pa byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs
T02D1449:342b-6: pa yin no // gang zhig cung zad cas bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1449:342b-7: sems can thams cad kyi mthar thug par son pa
T02D1449:342b-8: nyid kyis na khyab pa por bstan pa'i phyir gsungs
T02D1449:342b-9: pa yin te / lus can rnams kyi ni rkang
T02D1449:342b-10: med la sogs pa rnams kyi ste tshig dang dbyangs
T02D1449:342b-11: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang gnyis ka'i bdag
T02D1449:342b-12: nyid can skyed par byed pa de ni sngags thams
T02D1449:342b-13: cad kyi gzugs kho na ste /
T02D1449:342b-14: de las skyes par gyur cing nang du son pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:342b-15: lte ba'i phyogs las 'thon pa'i bde ba chen po'i sgra'am /
T02D1449:342b-16: gzhan du na n'a da nyid sngags te /
T02D1449:342b-18: gsang ba'i skad kyis snyoms par 'jug pa na 'di thams cad de /
T02D1449:342b-19: bud med dang skyes pa'i tshogs de nyid ni /
T02D1449:342b-20: skad de kho nas rab tu dga' bar byed do //
T02D1449:342b-21: dbyu gu'i dbye bas rgyal bar gyur pa de nyid
T02D1449:342b-22: kyis thig le'i dbye ba 'phel bar byed do zhes
T02D1449:342b-23: pas / de lta bu la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs byas pa'o //
T02D1449:342b-24: lus can thams cad kyes sna tshogs pa'i mdud pa'i
T02D1449:342b-25: gnas chen po sprul pa'i 'khor lo las chos kyi
T02D1449:342b-26: rol pa ste / yi ge thams cad dang /
T02D1449:342b-29: ngag chen po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1449:342b-30: chos kyi phung po stong phrag bcu rtsa bzhi la
T02D1449:342b-31: khyab par byed pa rnams par 'byung ste rab tu
T02D1449:342b-32: skye'o // dga' ba skyes pa'i dus su ni //
T02D1449:342b-33: sngon du gzung ba gang zhig smra //
T02D1449:342b-34: gsal dang mi gsal rang bzhin te //
T02D1449:342b-35: n'a da 'di ni sngags su bshad //
T02D1449:342b-36: dga' dang khro dang rmi lam dang //
T02D1449:342b-37: brgyal dang 'chi ba'i skad cig dang //
T02D1449:342b-38: sad dang dga' ba'i dus su ni //
T02D1449:342b-39: sgra de nyid ni thos par 'gyur //
T02D1449:342b-40: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1449:342b-41: sngar gsungs ba'i sngags grub pa la /
T02D1449:342b-42: sngags kha cig gi'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa yod pa ma yin na //
T02D1449:342b-43: gang gis na 'di sngags kyi dngos grub las mngon du ldog par byed /
T02D1449:342b-44: bsgom pa na phul du byung ba dang phul du byung ba ma yin pa nyid las te /
T02D1449:342b-45: gang zhig chos nyid kyi sa yi ges khyab pa de la yod ba na /
T02D1449:343a-0: des rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i @343a * //
T02D1449:343a-1: las byed pa 'di nyid ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1449:343a-3: ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin ni //
T02D1449:343a-4: sngags kyi sde tshan dbang phyug mchog / ces bya bas gsungs te /
T02D1449:343a-5: gdod ma nas ma skyes ba'i dngos po thams cad
T02D1449:343a-6: kyi rang bzhin mtshon bar byed pa aa yig 'di
T02D1449:343a-7: ni de'i dpe nyid kyis sngags de rnams rang gi
T02D1449:343a-8: las dang rab tu sbyor te /
T02D1449:343a-9: 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
T02D1449:343a-10: de nyid kyi phyir sde tshan dbang phyug mchog ces
T02D1449:343a-11: pa de rnams kyi bdag po nyid du byas nas
T02D1449:343a-12: te / de rnams de'i bdag po ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1449:343a-13: zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
T02D1449:343a-14: cho ga dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa
T02D1449:343a-15: gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las /
T02D1449:343a-16: rgyas par bstan pa dgu pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o /
T02D1449:343a-18: // / da ni chos la sogs pa'i sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo bzhi dang /
T02D1449:343a-19: dpyid kyi thig le'i nges pa'i tshig dang /
T02D1449:343a-20: sngags las skye gnas bzhi dang /
T02D1449:343a-21: dbyangs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni /
T02D1449:343a-22: brjod du med pa'i lhan cig skyes par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D1449:343b-25: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /

T02D1449:343b-33: kyi rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

T02D1449:343b-43: 'khor lo'i rnam pas yang dag gnas //
T02D1449:343b-44: sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni //

T02D1449:344a-1: dang mdzad pa gang gis 'gro phan phyir //
T02D1449:344a-2: rigs dang lha mo rigs kyi gtso bo rnams //

T02D1449:344a-16: mgrin par ni aom yig ring po bzhi'am //
T02D1449:344a-17: dbyangs bcu drug gis bskor ba'i tshangs pa'o //

T02D1449:344a-23: mtha' dang sha'i dbus kyi rtsa bzhi ni he ru
T02D1449:344a-24: ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo 'di

T02D1449:344a-29: 'khor lo rnams kyi g-yon dang g-yas dag tu zla ba dang nyi ma dag ste /

T02D1449:344a-31: ba dang khrag gi khams rab tu 'bab ba dag

T02D1449:344a-37: rdzas de dag gi 'bab pa'i sgo'i rnam pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1449:344a-38: mgrin pa nas brtsams zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D1449:344a-40: 'og gi gdong can mgrin pa nas brtsams nas lte
T02D1449:344a-41: ba'i dbus ji srid par myos byed 'bab pa dang
T02D1449:344a-42: / de bzhin du gang 'dir g-yas logs sur san'ar bshad pa'i rtsa gang yin pa ni /
T02D1449:344a-43: zla ba dang khu ba dang thu bsel gyi rlung ngo //

T02D1449:344b-1: ba dog dang byed las las so zhes pa tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1449:344b-2: zla ba dang nyi ma 'di dag ni sems kyi sgo'i dbye ba gnyis te /
T02D1449:344b-3: g-yas dang g-yon gyi lam gyi rang bzhin la brten
T02D1449:344b-4: nas steng dang 'og tu rab tu 'dzag cing rgyu
T02D1449:344b-5: bas rab tu 'bab pa dag ni 'jig rten dbang

T02D1449:344b-8: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T02D1449:344b-9: dpag med rdo rje'i nyi ma dag /'khor ba sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gnyis //
T02D1449:344b-11: phyi rol du yang gang gi tshe nub pa'i ril
T02D1449:344b-12: nyi ma 'og tu 'gro ba de'i tshe 'char ba'i
T02D1449:344b-13: phyir na zla ba steng du 'gro ste /

T02D1449:344b-17: kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong par ba tu 'jug pa'i

T02D1449:344b-20: de rnams ni zla ba rgyu ba rnams so //

T02D1449:344b-32: ma rab tu rgyu ba ni sems can thams cad

T02D1449:344b-35: de bzhin du gnyid log pa la yang zla ba'i cha dang nyi ma'i cha'o //
T02D1449:344b-36: de bzhin du gnyid log dang sa da pa'i gnas
T02D1449:344b-37: skabs ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin 'od
T02D1449:344b-38: dpag med dang rin chen 'byung ldan du shes par

T02D1449:344b-41: bya'o // phyir / g-yon dang g-yas pa'i ngos zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /

T02D1449:345a-16: su 'chi ba slu ba byas nas rnal 'byor pa

T02D1449:345a-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste phung po rnams kyi mchog rang rig pa'i skur shes par bya'o //

T02D1449:345b-5: padma gar dbang rgyal po ste //
T02D1449:345b-7: padma'i gar ni padma gar te /

T02D1449:345b-9: padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1449:345b-10: 'bar bar gyur ba'i nyi ma dang yang dag par
T02D1449:345b-11: sbyor ba las rgya'i mtshal lta bur snang bar byed

T02D1449:345b-16: padmar snang ba ni rang byung ngo /

T02D1449:345b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi sku gsungs te /

T02D1449:345b-31: lo // ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1449:345b-32: snang ba gnyis dang ro mnyam pa nyid ni 'khor ba'i lam ste /
T02D1449:345b-33: de'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pa gang du yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1449:345b-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku ni spros
T02D1449:345b-35: pa nye bar zhi ba gang du yin pa de'i

T02D1449:345b-37: lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba'o //

T02D1449:345b-40: rang rig pa nyid kyi phyir mchog go //
T02D1449:345b-41: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dag pa'o //

T02D1449:345b-43: sems dpa' ni snying rje ste /
T02D1449:345b-44: de'i rten yin pa'i phyir na rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //

T02D1449:346a-14: dgod dang lta ba dag gis sam //

T02D1449:346a-16: rgyud ni bzhi po rnams kyi yang //

T02D1449:346a-20: po zos nas rgyud thams cad nyid du srin bur

T02D1449:346a-29: de rnams kyi dra ba ni tshogs te /
T02D1449:346a-31: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1449:346a-32: chos kyi sku ni rnam pa thams cad pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:346a-33: gsang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:346a-34: gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di rnams su gsang
T02D1449:346a-35: chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dgongs pa'i
T02D1449:346a-36: skad de / gang zhig sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang /
T02D1449:346a-39: 'khor lo bzhi rnams su brjod par bya ste /
T02D1449:346a-40: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi sdom pa dang /
T02D1449:346a-41: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas
T02D1449:346a-42: pa chos nyid kyi gzugs yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1449:346a-43: ro // yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1449:346b-0: de nyid me long lta bu la @346b sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs te /
T02D1449:346b-2: sna tshogs pa'i shes bya'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1449:346b-3: de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1449:346b-4: rkang med la sogs pa rnams shin tu gcig pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1449:346b-5: de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1449:346b-6: de nyid don dam par so sor spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:346b-7: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1449:346b-8: de nyid las 'gro ba'i don rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:346b-9: de nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1449:346b-10: chos nyid kyi gzugs nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1449:346b-11: yang na rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la
T02D1449:346b-12: sogs pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1449:346b-13: du gsungs te / de ltar ni /
T02D1449:346b-14: rang rig pa'i rnam pas snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:346b-15: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1449:346b-16: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir de nyid mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1449:346b-17: 'di las longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i rin po che 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1449:346b-19: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dpag tu med pa'i
T02D1449:346b-20: 'od gang yin pa 'di ni 'od dpag med do
T02D1449:346b-21: // gang las sems can gyi don gyi bya ba
T02D1449:346b-22: ma lus pa grub pa de ni don yod grub
T02D1449:346b-23: // pa'o // don dam pa'i rang bzhin du gsungs
T02D1449:346b-24: nas bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1449:346b-25: kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin du gsungs te /
T02D1449:346b-26: gsang chen la sogs pa lnga rnams bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin yang yin la /
T02D1449:346b-27: gong bu dang thig le'i rnam pa ni nam mkha'
T02D1449:346b-28: lnga'i dbus su ro mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs pa'o
T02D1449:346b-29: // kun rdzob tu yang rang gi lus la gnas
T02D1449:346b-30: pa'i ye shes chen po ni shin tu rnam par
T02D1449:346b-31: dag pa'i ye shes su sangs rgyas rnams gsung par
T02D1449:346b-32: mdzad do zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o
T02D1449:346b-33: // // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bas de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs te /
T02D1449:346b-34: sngar nges par byas pa'i mchog tu bde ba'i rang
T02D1449:346b-35: bzhin rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos pa gang yin
T02D1449:346b-36: pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes brjod par bya ste
T02D1449:346b-37: / 'dis ni sngar yang don dam pa'i rang bzhin nyid du rtogs par byas pa /
T02D1449:346b-38: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du bstan nas /
T02D1449:346b-39: de dang dbyer med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma phag mo bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:347a-1: rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:347a-3: lus kyi bdag nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1449:347a-4: dpal he ru ka'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'bar
T02D1449:347a-5: ba ste / bsrub par bya ba dang /
T02D1449:347a-6: srub par byed pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'i las
T02D1449:347a-7: kyi rlung gis yang dag bskyod pa'i me'i gzugs can
T02D1449:347a-8: mar yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa de
T02D1449:347a-9: nyid ni 'di'i lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ma
T02D1449:347a-10: rang bzhin gyis grub pa zla ba dang zla ba'i
T02D1449:347a-11: 'od lta bu'o // de nyid ni b'a r'a h'i ste /
T02D1449:347a-12: b'a yig dang r'a yig las /
T02D1449:347a-13: rlung dang byin za dag gis ham las ra ma
T02D1449:347a-14: ti ste dga' bar byed pa 'dzag go zhes bas
T02D1449:347a-15: b'a r'a h'i yin gyi phag gi gdong pa ni
T02D1449:347a-16: ma yin no // dpyid ni h'um yig la sogs pa yin la /
T02D1449:347a-17: thig le lta bu yin pas thig le ste /
T02D1449:347a-18: de rnyed pa na yang dag par tshim pa'o zhes gong du bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:347a-19: skra yi rtse mo zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di'i tshad gsungs te /
T02D1449:347a-20: gang zhig skra yi rtse mo stong phrag brgya ste 'bum gyi tshad kyi sha chas te /
T02D1449:347a-21: de lta bu'i cha shas kyi rnam pa gang gi yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1449:347a-23: 'di'i shin tu phra ba nyid rtogs par byas pa yin te /
T02D1449:347a-24: rnal 'byor ba'i ye shes kyi bgrod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1449:347a-26: bad rtsa'i skud ba lta bu rab phra'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1449:347a-27: bskal me sngon song bde chen gnas ni ji srid par //
T02D1449:347a-28: khyab cing gnas gang skyes bu chen pos nyer thob pa //
T02D1449:347a-29: de ni he ru ka mchog shes rab mar brjod do //
T02D1449:347a-33: legs pa'i phreng ba'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02D1449:347a-34: lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni //
T02D1449:347a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i byed pa po gsungs te /
T02D1449:347a-37: shes rab dang thabs gnyis sbyor ba de'i dus skabs su'o //
T02D1449:347a-38: de nyid ni ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'o //
T02D1449:347a-39: rnal 'byor bas ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshams thams cad nas 'thon te /
T02D1449:347a-42: dbang po'i rnam par rtog pa bsdigs par byas nas /
T02D1449:347a-43: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i mdud pa'i
T02D1449:347a-44: gzugs kyi phung po dang khams kyi rnam par rtog
T02D1449:347a-45: ba'i bud shing bsregs nas g-yas kyi sna bug gnas
T02D1449:347b-0: 'thon te / mdzod spur son pa'i @347b bug pa
T02D1449:347b-1: nas phyogs bcur gnas pa de rnams kyi spyi po'i
T02D1449:347b-3: de rnams kyi 'khor lo bzhi pa bsregs te /
T02D1449:347b-4: slar yang sna bug g-yon nas 'thon te /
T02D1449:347b-5: spyi bo'i bu ga nas zhugs nas sngar bzhin du
T02D1449:347b-6: bsregs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'phel bar byed
T02D1449:347b-7: do // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtan par 'gyur zhing rnam par thim par byed do //
T02D1449:347b-9: bsrub bya dang srub byed yang dag par sbyor ba las ye shes kyi me 'di ni /
T02D1449:347b-10: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du thim par byed de /
T02D1449:347b-11: 'bar ba'i snang ba rnams kyis dam tshig gi 'khor
T02D1449:347b-12: lor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsregs nas
T02D1449:347b-13: / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i thabs la lan gsum du bskor te /
T02D1449:347b-14: mdzod spur song nas gnad kyi sgo phye ste /
T02D1449:347b-15: aoo dya na gyi ming can nas phyogs bcur gnas
T02D1449:347b-16: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dz'a landha ra'i
T02D1449:347b-17: ming can gser gyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02D1449:347b-18: sngon du de rnams kyi 'khor lo bzhi po bsregs nas /
T02D1449:347b-19: sngar bshad pa'i sgo nas 'o ma'i rgyun gyis song
T02D1449:347b-20: nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dga' ba
T02D1449:347b-21: skyed par byed do zhes so //
T02D1449:347b-22: rgyud kyi rim pa dang ye shes kyi rim pa sdud par byed de /
T02D1449:347b-23: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i logs su ni //
T02D1449:347b-24: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1449:347b-25: zhes bya ba 'dis ni sngags kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1449:347b-26: chos kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa na gsang ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1449:347b-27: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1449:347b-28: de la sku gsum gyis 'khyud pa la ni /
T02D1449:347b-30: snang ba gnyis su bshad pa dang /
T02D1449:347b-31: de ro mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byas pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1449:347b-32: n'a da dang thig le phrad par bshad pa ni /
T02D1449:347b-33: he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo dag dpyid dang thig ler brjod cing gsungs so //
T02D1449:347b-35: de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba gsungs so //
T02D1449:347b-36: sngags dang rgyud dang ye shes dang gsang ba'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1449:347b-37: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i logs su ni //
T02D1449:347b-38: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1449:347b-41: 'di nyid shes rab lhan cig skyes /
T02D1449:347b-42: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1449:348a-2: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i tshig dang /
T02D1449:348a-4: bsregs pa nyid kyi sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1449:348a-5: slar yang dga' bskyed par byed //
T02D1449:348a-8: snga ma bzhin du gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1449:348a-9: zhes bya ba 'dis rim pa bzhi po sngags dang
T02D1449:348a-10: rgyud dang ye shes dang gsang ba rnams bshad cing
T02D1449:348a-12: de bzhin du sprul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi po la /
T02D1449:348a-13: gang zhig dbyangs lnga la sogs pa rnam par dgod pa dang bsdus nas /
T02D1449:348a-14: a'a li k'a li gnyis po nyis 'gyur du gyur pa dang /
T02D1449:348a-15: h'um yig la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga po dang
T02D1449:348a-16: ma ning gi sa bon rnam par dgod pa dang
T02D1449:348a-17: / tshangs pa ring po rnam par dgod pa dang /
T02D1449:348a-18: a'a li sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor
T02D1449:348a-19: ba'i gzhom du med pa'i yi ge rnam par dgod
T02D1449:348a-20: pa rnams ni / sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02D1449:348a-21: sde tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D1449:348a-22: yi ge rnams kyi mchog gzugs kyis //
T02D1449:348a-23: aa ni yi ge dam pa'o //
T02D1449:348a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1449:348a-25: mdor bstan pa la ltos nas rgyas par bstan pa ste /
T02D1449:348a-26: mdor bstan pa ni yang dag par bsdus pas khong du chud par byed pa'o //
T02D1449:348a-28: rgya chen pos so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma ste /
T02D1449:348a-29: rgyas par bstan pa 'di rnams ni le'u zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1449:348a-30: gang zhig ral gri dang mig ces bya ba la
T02D1449:348a-31: sogs pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad po rnams kyi
T02D1449:348a-32: don ni sngar gsal bar bshad pa de rnams te
T02D1449:348a-33: / de rnams sngar gsungs pa'i dpyid kyi thig le'i
T02D1449:348a-34: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rtogs pa las 'gyur
T02D1449:348a-35: ro zhes bsgrub par byas pa yin no //
T02D1449:348a-36: dbang bo zhan pa'i sems can yongs su gzung pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1449:348a-37: 'di ni dbang po rnon po'i gang zag gi yul yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1449:348a-38: mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1449:348a-40: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin te /
T02D1449:348a-41: de'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul rin po che
T02D1449:348a-42: ston pa po bla ma yang dag par rtogs pa'i
T02D1449:348a-43: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che rnam par
T02D1449:348a-44: 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D1449:348a-45: brgyan pa'i mkhas pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1449:348b-0: de bzhin du gang yang gzhan du rgyas @348b par bstan pa dang /
T02D1449:348b-1: shes rab ma'i mngon par brjod pa dang /
T02D1449:348b-2: slob dpon de'i bka' drin las lhan cig skyes pa myong bas na /
T02D1449:348b-4: tshig so so'i ngag de kho na nyid 'gyur ba
T02D1449:348b-5: med pa snang bar mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de
T02D1449:348b-6: bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis yang dag
T02D1449:348b-7: par rol par mdzad pa 'bad pa dang bcas pas
T02D1449:348b-8: nye bar thob pa rnams te /
T02D1449:348b-9: gang kho na myong ba de khon med dang rgyud thams cad kyi nang du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1449:348b-11: lung las yid ches nyid dang ni //
T02D1449:348b-12: de bzhin bla ma las yid ches //
T02D1449:348b-13: rang las yid ches nyid dang ni //
T02D1449:348b-14: de bzhin gzhan las yid chas pa //
T02D1449:348b-15: yid ches bzhi yis gzung bar bya //
T02D1449:348b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsang ba'i de kho
T02D1449:348b-17: na nyid rab tu gsal ba las gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D1449:348b-18: ro // de bzhin du gang yang rdo rje mkha'
T02D1449:348b-19: 'gro dang ldan pa'i rang gi snying po yang phyi
T02D1449:348b-21: de ltar byas nas bdag gis dpyid kyi thig le 'di byas pa yin te /
T02D1449:348b-22: gang las dad pa brtan pos 'dzin par byed pa de rnams ni gzhal du med pa'i //
T02D1449:348b-23: dad pa brtan pos bzung pa'i gzhung byed pa nyid
T02D1449:348b-24: kyis rang bzhin brtan pa'i sgo nas gzhung rdzogs par
T02D1449:348b-25: brtan pa'i phyir zhes pa dpal ldan bla ma sangs
T02D1449:348b-26: rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1449:348b-27: bdag la phan pa rdo rje'i bla ma sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' thob pa /
T02D1449:348b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gnas pa /
T02D1449:348b-29: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nag po bdag gis dpyid kyi thig ler brjod pa 'di ni /
T02D1449:348b-30: rgyas par bstan pa bcu'i bdag nyid du byas pa gang yin pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1449:348b-31: rgyud thams cad kyi don yang dag par bsdus bas
T02D1449:348b-32: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya
T02D1449:348b-33: ba'i don to zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub
T02D1449:348b-34: pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya
T02D1449:348b-35: cher 'grel pa gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las
T02D1449:348b-36: / rgyas par bstan pa bcu pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1449:348b-37: dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D1449:348b-39: // / sa skyong 'dzin ma'i thig le'i gtsug rgyan nags nang du //
T02D1449:348b-40: 'phags yul mkhas pa'i dpyid kyi rin chen rab dkod [?] pa //
T02D1449:348b-41: de tshe dpyid kyi thig le'i rgyas 'grel me tog gi //
T02D1449:349a-0: rdzogs pa'i sbrang rtsi bung ba gzhon @349a * //
T02D1449:349a-2: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po nags kyi rin chen zhes bya ba /
T02D1449:349a-3: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i zhabs kyi thig le la yang dag par reg pas /
T02D1449:349a-4: dpal he ru ka'i dpyid kyi dga' ba yang dag par thob pa de la /
T02D1449:349a-5: chos kyi rgyal po grags pa 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba /
T02D1449:349a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod
T02D1449:349a-7: mtha' dag gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa des gsol
T02D1449:349a-8: ba btab nas / de'i bka' lung dang /
T02D1449:349a-9: grub pa'i skyes bu zhang gi ring lugs pa chen po bsod nams rin chen gyis kyang bskul nas /
T02D1449:349a-10: pandi ta chen po de nyid dang /
